WorkItem.Description: Is it possible to manage updates published in wsus console through WPP tool.?
WorkItem.Summary: Is it possible to manage updates published in wsus console through WPP tool.

Comments.Message: No. You can't manage Microsoft's Updates with WPP. Only locally published updates are available in WPP.

Hi GaneshD,
Norbert is right. WPP focused on locally published updates. You should manage Microsoft updates with the Wsus Console.
Detect now and install now options in WPP is applicable for both windows update and locally published packages rite?
Detectnow is a option for the local Windows Update, the WU Agent don't know nothing about WPP, he will install all Software. ;)

"detect now" does the same, as if you put it into an cmd locally on a client. It triggers the local update agent of a computer. It does not distinguish between Microsoft or local published updates.

HTH
Norbert

Norbert and Winfried are right. Sending 'DetectNow' from WPP have the same result than opening a CommnandLine Window on the client and typing 'WuAuClt /DetectNow'
idem for 'ReportNow'.
